sentence: Many parts of the country were experiencing frigid temperatures as we were in Boston
If you want the hottest club atmosphere in town look elsewhere
The pool is good it is not really a party scene more older people lounging and some kids but it was nice nevertheless

The staff are nothing but so friendly and helpful with my experience inparticularly Imer on reception did as much as he could for when me and my friend stayed to the extent of club passes and arranging limo services to collect us with 2 hour drinking periods paying a one off fee
While I had been able to enjoy staying there in the past this experience gave me even more comprehensive exposure to the level of service The Savoy offers
could not have asked for any better service then the one my wife and I experienced
We did not eat at the restaurant wish we had with our experience at local restaurants
If we chose to return I would suggest that they offer room service and music polside to provide a little more ambience
Just did nt like that people were partying and smoking pot too loud in the pool while there were kids around and family athmosphere
it is just a couple blocks away from the South Beach Scene but the neighborhood is nicely quiet
Very nice location and atmosphere alitle quieter than a few blocks down and beautiful hotel at the perfect spot

A cosy atmosphere all around great position at the beach with old style windows located with classy restaurants to the left when you go out in the street towards south pier and bling bling restaurants to the right ocean drive northbound
Justin who works on the beach for Bouche Brothers was very professional and helpful by providing us with the best experience ever
Great customer service experience and we can not wait to return to pay them a visit again
Thanks for the wonderful experience and great job ladies
Justin made our beach experience very relaxed and was attentive to our needs
And Jose to taking care of us at early checking on ABSOLUTELY best bachelorette weekend experience
Everything was perfect for our family pool was fun beach toys for the kids nice people staying at the hotel and all the staff was extremely nice and acomodating they truly cared about our experience
We had an awesome experience on the beach here
We found the beach atmosphere to be one of the best in the area
